results.title: Climate Activists Throw Mashed Potatoes on Monet Painting
results.abstract: The stunt in a German museum was the latest attack on widely admired art, carried out by protesters demanding action on climate change.

media.caption: After throwing mashed potatoes at a painting by Claude Monet, on exhibit in Potsdam, Germany, the climate protesters each glued a hand to the wall on Sunday.

results.title: ‘We Heard It, We Saw It, Then We Opened Fire’
results.abstract: With an intense, hastily assembled effort, the Ukrainian military is pioneering successful techniques in the difficult art of anti-drone warfare.

media.caption: Police officers in Kyiv, Ukraine, trying to shoot down a drone during an attack on Oct. 17. The drone was believed to be an Iranian-made Shahed-136, purchased by Russia in August.
